text: Dughiar pumuning gɨvazɨma, gumazir mam Kanan nguibamɨn ikia amizimɨn ikiasa, ezɨ amuimɨn ikiamin isam oto. Kanan nguibam a Galilin Distrighɨn aven iti. Dughiar kam Iesusɨn amebam uaghan iti.2:1 Iesus amizir mirakelɨn avɨribar akaba, da Jonɨn akɨnafarimɨn aven iti. Arazir kabar, an akagha ghaze, a guizbangɨra Godra. Nɨ vezɨn kabar gan: Luk 2:11, 2:18-19, 2:23, 3:2, 4:54, 6:2, 6:14, 6:26, 9:16, 11:45, 12:18, ko 12:37.
